name: Parkitect Cheats
body:
### Cheating in parkitect
This mod adds cheats to [Parkitect](http://themeparkitect.com/), the [ParkitectNexus Client](https://parkitectnexus.com/) is required to run this Mod.

### Features
- Spawn as many guests as you wish
- Give yourself money
- Change the speed
- Rate the park
- Toggle rain
- Set the lightlevel

### Controls
- Windows: T
- OSX: Option + T

### Suggestions
You can leave your suggestions [here](https://parkitectnexus.com/assets/165f7dee7a/cheat-mod).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
